review: I had an outstanding experience at Partha dental clinic. The staff was incredibly friendly and professional, making me feel comfortable throughout my visit. The Dr.kowsikan was highly skilled and took the time to explain each procedure, which put my mind at ease. The clinic was clean and well-maintained, which added to the overall positive atmosphere. I would highly recommend this dental clinic to anyone seeking top-notch dental care at great pricing

I am filled with immense gratitude and appreciation towards Dr. Kowsikan sir and the entire team at Partha Dental for the incredible transformation of my Invisalign treatment. The results have surpassed my expectations, with my teeth now perfectly aligned, would surely recommend the clinic to everyone.

Great medical office, wonderful and warm experience from start to finish. Appreciate Dr. (Kowsikan) taking time to go over the diagnosis clearly and treatment options. Was referred over by my general doctor and can see why. Highly recommendedâ€¦!!!

I wanted to share my experience with Dr.kowsikan. during my recent checkup, Dr.kowsikan was responsible and attentive.. I hav done root canal treatment with him.. he explained the procedure and done a painless procedure . I highly recommend to my friends and families..

He is soft and kind no doubt in that.But very disappointed with dr.koushikan. work.he missed a canal in my rootcanal tooth and whenever I went back for pain
he was not ready to accept that the canal was missed and kept said no infection. ** ************* ******* *** **** ***** ***** *** ***** ****** **** ** *** ** **** ** **** ******* **** ***** ******* *** ** **** ********Still i believed his words that there is no infection and no missed canal. But I had unobturated canal and infection as he short filled went periapical granuloma stage. It's purely bcoz i trusted his words as he said no missed canal and no infection. I m so disappointed I was in pain for months as i believed his words and didn't go for second opinion.
** ****** ***** *********** ** **** *** ******* **** ******* ** *** ** * *** **** **** ** **** ******** *** **** ** *** **** *******

I wanted to share my experience with Dr.kowsikan. during my recent checkup, Dr.kowsikan was attentive and made me feel better. He took the time to look at my concern and provide me thorough explanation of the treatment plan available to me. I appreciate Dr.kowsikan professionaliam and kindness throughout the treatment.. I have done flap surgery with laser done by Dr.kowsikan.. he made me very comfortable during the procedure

I took my son 6 yrs for pulpectomy, previously in other clinic son had same procedure, but it was very painful experience with injected anesthesia, but Dr. kowsigan made it very simple without injection, we are  happy with his treatment n i strongly recommend him

I first visited Partha Dental last week for my root canal treatment. Dr.Kowshikan clearly explained me all the problems and he did complete painless treatment, The ambience and doctor was patient friendly, would recommend this to everyone

Went to Partha dental for my mothers treatment, Dr.Kowsigan recieved me well clearly explained me all the issues and he was very polite made my mom comfrtable and did painless treatments with much ease, Thanks to Partha dental, would recommend this to everyone

Dr. Kowsikan has great friendly attitude, transparent about the treatment of what he was doing, which gives us a clarity to make mindset. 

I am happy with RC treatment and can recommend to others.
